title.rendered: Actress Hina Khan has been diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer

content.rendered:
Actress Hina Khan took to Instagram to share her health update, asking her fans to send her the best.

Amid the rumors about her health, actress Hina Khan it was said that she had been diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer. The actress revealed that her treatment has started and she is determined to overcome this challenge and come out strong and healthy. (Also Read: Hina Khan Shares Hospitalization Again Due To High Fever: ‘She’s Sick’)

On Friday, the actor took to his Instagram account to share the news with his fans. He assured everyone that he was “doing great” and asked his fans to send him their best.

diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer

“Hello everyone, To address recent rumors, I want to share with some Hinaholics and everyone who loves me and cares about me. I was diagnosed with breast cancer. Despite this difficult diagnosis, I want to reassure everyone that I am doing well. I am strong, determined, and determined to overcome this disease. My healing has already begun and I am ready to do whatever it takes to come out stronger,” Hina wrote.

“I kindly ask you for respect and before this time. I see your love, strength, and blessings very much. My personal experiences, anecdotes, and supportive suggestions will significantly help you throughout this journey. My family and those around me focus, determine, and stay positive. By the Almighty’s grace, we believe I will overcome this challenge and be in perfect health. Please send your prayers, blessings, and love,” he added. As soon as he shared the news, his fans and friends sent their condolences, wishing the actor a speedy recovery.

Rashami Desai wrote, “You always stay strong and send prayers and lots of healing.” Ankita Lokhande added, “Hina you are stronger than that, she is a girl!!! This will work!! I am sending you love and lots of strength right now. God bless you.

Read Also: Malaika shares a cryptic note about ‘trust’ on Arjun Kapoor’s birthday
